DOC.brief_summary: Patients on hemodialysis will be randomly assigned (1:1) to continue on conventional hemodialysis or on-line hemodiafiltration, both three times per week. A 3 year follow-up and a sample size of around 750 will be necessary to detect a 35% reduction in mortality.
DOC.brief_title: Survival Study in Patients Undergoing On-line Hemodiafiltration
DOC.criteria: Age 18 and older Currently undergoing hemodialysis Clinical stability Stable vascular access Chronic inflammatory diseases Liver cirrhosis Malignancies Chronic immunosuppressant or antiinflammatory use Dialysis through temporary catheter or single puncture
